title: Propulsion Assignment
description: Analyze basic propulsion system parameters and prepare a short report on thrust optimization.

title: Combustion Analysis
description: Perform combustion calculations for liquid rocket engines and compare fuel efficiency metrics.

title: Nozzle Design Project
description: Design a convergent-divergent nozzle and present simulation results for various chamber pressures.

title: Aerodynamics Quiz
description: Short quiz covering topics in fluid flow, lift generation, and drag coefficients.

title: Flow Analysis
description: Simulate airflow over a 2D airfoil using CFD software and analyze velocity and pressure distributions.

title: Heating Analysis
description: Examine heat transfer characteristics in compressible flow and prepare a technical summary.

title: Structural Design Task
description: Design and validate a lightweight structural frame capable of withstanding launch stresses.

title: Orbital Calculations
description: Calculate orbital transfer parameters and delta-v requirements for a satellite mission.

title: Systems Engineering Exam
description: Comprehensive exam assessing understanding of system integration, design, and testing principles.
